```{r setup}
library(MortalMove)
library(cmdstanr)
set_cmdstan_path("C:/Users/jyuewang/.cmdstan/cmdstan-2.36.0/cmdstan-2.36.0")
```

# Simulating data

```{r}
sim <- simulate_data(n_animals = 100, n_fixes = 200, n_dead = 20, n_knots = 25)
sim[["raw_data"]] <- NULL
sim[["ind_cell_effect"]] <- 0
```


# Fit stan model using cmdstan

```{r, eval=FALSE}

model_file <- paste("D:/OneDrive - UW/Research/MortalMove/inst/stan", "mortality_model.stan", sep = "/")
mod <- cmdstan_model(model_file, exe_file = "D:/OneDrive - UW/Research/MortalMove/inst/stan/mortality_model.exe")
fit <- mod$sample(
  data = sim,
  chains = 2,
  parallel_chains = 2,
  iter_warmup = 500,
  iter_sampling = 1500,
  seed = 123
)

```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
data(fit)
```

# Check diagnostics
```{r}
diagnostic_fit(fit, plot = TRUE, observed_y = sim$delta)
bayesplot::mcmc_trace(fit$draws(c("llambda","alpha","beta")))
```

# Fit with spatial autocorrelation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Fit with spatial autocorrelation
sim[["ind_cell_effect"]] <- 1
model_file <- paste("D:/OneDrive - UW/Research/MortalMove/inst/stan", "mortality_model.stan", sep = "/")
mod <- cmdstan_model(model_file, exe_file = "D:/OneDrive - UW/Research/MortalMove/inst/stan/mortality_model.exe")

# run fewer iterations due to time constraint
fit_spat <- mod$sample(
  data = sim,
  chains = 2,
  parallel_chains = 2,
  iter_warmup = 50,
  iter_sampling = 150,
  seed = 123
)
```


```{r, echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
data(fit_spat)
```

```{r}
diagnostic_fit(fit_spat, plot = TRUE, observed_y = sim$delta)
bayesplot::mcmc_trace(fit_spat$draws(c("llambda","alpha","beta")))
```
